long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus Better, Play Better!

Voice Chess Hide empowers chess players to customize their online gaming experience by allowing you to eliminate distractions during matches.

Key Features:
Conceal Opponent’s Name: Keep your opponent anonymous to sharpen your focus on the game.
Remove Profile Pictures: Strip away profile images to concentrate entirely on the chessboard.
Hide Rankings: Eliminate the visibility of rankings for a more relaxed and enjoyable gaming atmosphere.
Mask Titles and Badges: Ensure fairness by hiding titles and badges that might sway your perceptions.
Disable Connection Status: Turn off connection indicators to minimize interruptions during play.
Hide Flair Icons: Simplify your interface by removing flair icons, allowing for a clearer view.

Why Install?
This extension is ideal for players seeking a streamlined chess experience free from unnecessary distractions. With Voice Chess Hide, you can enhance your focus, engage more deeply in matches, and reduce external pressures. Whether you're a casual player or a competitive strategist, this tool helps create a personalized and comfortable environment for your chess games.

Take charge of your chess experience—install now and elevate your gameplay!
